===================== MSnBase Read MS/MS =====================
----------- Description -----------
| This module is used to retrieve MS/MS spectra from mzML files.
----------- Input files -----------
+------------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +==============================+============+ | 1) mzML file | mzML | +------------------------------+------------+
---------- Parameters ----------
mzML file | A mzML file containing the MS/MS spectra of one sample |
------------ Output files ------------
msnbase_read_msms_output_1.rdata | A rdata file containing the MS/MS compound spectra |
